Moonee seems oblivious to the struggles of the adults at first However it shifts to the c hild ’ s point of view so the audience will understand that she’s observing the adults and that she’s unconsciously beginning to notice the problems surround ing them. The scene where Moonee starts crying and her friend holding her hand rushing towards Disney land was so shocking and ravishing at the same time.
